name: Everest Inc - Intermediate Milestone 1
description:
CS 6460 Educational Technology - Milestone 1 - Low Fidelity Prototype

This is a basic prototype for my CS 6460 project, Everest Inc.

The main goal for Milestone 1 is to flesh out some early mockups of the UI and build out the scaffolding for each scene of the game. In this prototype all camps are unlocked, and you can navigate to them. This will give me a solid foundation on which to build out the core functionality (Contract/Recruitment Systems).

This prototype includes all the tasks associated with Milestone 1:

  • Start Menu / Main Menu
  • Collect digital placeholder assets
  • Loading Screen
  • Scenes: Base Camp, Camp 1, Camp 2, and Summit.

The following tasks have also been included as progress was made on these and are included in the prototype.

  • Scenes: Camp 3, Camp 4, Recruitment, Supply Shop, and Permit Shop
